name: kali-mcp
description: Kali Linux security tools integration via MCP - execute penetration testing commands, run security scans, automate reconnaissance, and solve CTF challenges with AI assistance

prerequisites.description: Requires Docker or local Kali Linux environment with Python 3 and security tools installed
steps: Install Docker Desktop and ensure it's running (for containerized deployment)
OR Install Python 3 on a Kali Linux machine for local deployment
Ensure Kali Linux security tools are installed (nmap, gobuster, curl, wget, etc.)
Configure API server endpoint and authentication if using remote deployment
Set KALI_API_URL environment variable to point to your Kali API server
Optional: Set KALI_API_TOKEN for authenticated API access
